name: bj-modalb

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0)))), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, w0)))), w0)

comment: A short form of the axiom B of modal logic using only primitive symbols ( ` -> , -. , A. ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
